title: Unknown, From "Typic" App. Please Help
content:
Im using an app called TYPIC, i really love this "T" Font. Please help, Thank you.

Font: 

 Marcellus SC 

Solved By: 

 [bojev](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417002058/http:/typophile.com/user/7409 "View user profile.")

author: notjetimisela

comments.content:
Marcellus (Regular )from Google-Web-Fonts is close  
you might also like Seta Reta NF (Regular) from Nick-Curtis which is also close.
You also can look inside the app bundle on your computer.
Riccardo, Typic is a IPhone App so does it have a type bundle - I just assumed the fonts in it are coded into the app along with some icons. Thus I looked for things close.

iPhone apps are “bundles” just like Mac OS X apps, but zipped. In OS X, you need to locate the desired app, which will have a .ipa extension (if you have them visible), then open it with the zip extractor of your choice. You will end with a folder. Inside this folder there will be another, called “Payload”, which contain the app (with a .app extension). Right-click to show the bundle content and somewhere in there you will find regular font files.

thank you bojev, I thought it was Optima by Hermann Zapf at the first time, but it is not.  
thnak you typophile.com, I really love this forum.

and also thank you riccard0 for your information.
Cool Riccardo, learn something new here.

Marcellus also has a Pro version [https://www.myfonts.com/fonts/stiggy-sands/marcellus-pro/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417002058/https:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/stiggy-sands/marcellus-pro/ "https://www.myfonts.com/fonts/stiggy-sands/marcellus-pro/")
